page.title: 04TONG HOUSING SURVEY
page.content: { Sample:{38}houses visited. {Q1. How long has the house been built? Under 20 yrs:18 Over 100 yrs:20(including 1 in 1625) {Q2. How long have you lived in it? Old houses:1-75 yrs. New houses:8 mths-12 yrs. {Q3. Are you local or from afar? All local except: Brighouse-1; Harrogate-2; Lancashire-1; London-1; Rhodesia-1. {Q4. How far do you travel to work? 0-3 miles:12; 4-10 miles:14; 10+ miles:3 (Retired:9). {Q5. Why did you choose Tong? Born there-Job-Peace & Quiet-Parents. {Q6. What changes would you like? None-Bus service-Lower rates-No more building-lower speed limits.
